body: Hi Chris, Following the webinar on Dragonfly, i'm having issues with different weather files. The UWG all the times end with the following error: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/lHtNjavnNiNhLNFMKuExffRoe2dYZ3wl4N1JTjq6x*Zvl1ijLuoWWb*pNuRRroPSaNkh8MlYOw*-5F*1UAjpARNJfJuwcJFd/Capture.JPG)Any ideas? I installed version 9.0 of UWG (tried with 9.2 but it doesn't work). Thanks, -A.
